password_min_size: The password must contain at least 8 characters
password_lowercase_req: The password must contain at least a lower case letter
password_uppercase_req: The password must contain at least an upper case letter
password_number_req: The password must contain at least a number
password_specialcaracter_req: The password must contain at least a special character
hero_page_subtitle: Find out if a news is really true or if it is just a fake news. Also contribute with the app filtering news that you know about
